subject: History
goals: Understand the causes and the global context leading up to World War I.
milestones: By the end of the week, be able to identify at least three key events or factors that contributed to the onset of World War I.

learning_tasks.task: Read a brief overview of the geopolitical landscape before World War I.
Watch a documentary segment on the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.

practice_tasks.task: Create a timeline of key events leading up to World War I.

resources: Recommended textbook chapter on pre-World War I Europe, online video lecture from the History Channel on the causes of World War I.
